title: Can women remove facial hair (face, forehead etc) while avoiding the eyebrows? - Assim al hakeem
transcript: uh sadhu for germany yeah i have a question like can women remove hair from forehead in pluck or shave from germany says what's the running on removing the hair on your forehead so it's not your scalp it's not your eyebrows it's in the in between there's nothing wrong in that whether it's for men or women they can remove that without any problem for women they can remove all face facial hair with the exception of the eyebrows so if she has a mustache a beard some uh whiskers or whatever that is permissible to be removed insha'allah allah knows best
